profile.description1: Hola, soy Nicolas orellana. Construyo soluciones y soluciono problemas.

profile.description1: Hi, I'm Nicolas Orellana. I build solutions and solve problems.
profile.description2: I‚Äôm a Front-end Developer with a solid background in L1 Technical Support. My day-to-day is driven by two passions: writing clean, efficient code to build amazing interfaces, and diagnosing technical issues to ensure everything runs smoothly.
profile.description3: My experience in support taught me something vital for development: user empathy. I don‚Äôt just want a website to look good; I want it to be functional, accessible, and bug-free. If there‚Äôs a bug, I‚Äôll find it; if there‚Äôs an idea, I‚Äôll code it.

projects.second-project-title: Dev Classes </> | Programming Course Landing Page This is a modern,

projects.second-project-dates7: No Server Dependencies: Runs entirely on the client-side.
projects.second-project-dates9: Tailwind CSS: Styled via CDN with custom configuration.

projects.third-project-dates1: Estudio N√≥mada is an elegant and modern landing page designed for a high-end interior design studio. The project focuses on 'conscious design', combining a minimalist aesthetic with advanced interactive features.

projects.four-project-dates1: Automated web system for generating software project quotes, powered by Artificial Intelligence (Google Gemini).
projects.four-project-dates3: This project is a web application that allows users to request estimated quotes for different types of projects (Websites, Ecommerce, Apps, etc.). Through an interactive form, the system gathers customer requirements and uses the Google Gemini API to analyze data and generate a detailed preliminary quote, including suggested price, estimated time, and deliverables.
projects.four-project-dates4: Additionally, it features a secure admin panel to manage received requests.
projects.four-project-dates6: AI Quoting: Google Gemini integration for real-time analysis and cost estimation.
projects.four-project-dates7: Modern Interface: Responsive and attractive design using TailwindCSS.
projects.four-project-dates13: Security: Admin user authentication and route protection.
projects.four-project-dates15: Web Server (Apache/Nginx) - XAMPP/WAMP recommended for local development.

projects.five-project-dates1: ‚ö™üî¥ El M√°s Grande - Official Store This is an E-commerce Landing Page project designed for sportswear sales. The site features a modern interface, a dynamic ordering system, and an integrated admin panel for request management.
projects.five-project-dates2: üöÄ Features 100% Responsive Design: Optimized for multiple resolutions, including specific mobile devices (tested on 360x775px).
projects.five-project-dates3: Modern Style: Built with Tailwind CSS and Google Fonts (Montserrat).
projects.five-project-dates4: Ordering System: Functional form that captures customer data and stores it in memory (or SQLite database).
projects.five-project-dates5: Admin Panel: Restricted access to view shipping requests in real-time.
projects.five-project-dates6: Mobile-First: Code structure designed primarily for efficiency on mobile devices.
projects.five-project-dates7: üõ†Ô∏è Technologies Used Frontend: HTML5, CSS3, Tailwind CSS, JavaScript (Vanilla).

footer.footer-info1: Hi! I'm Nicolas Orellana. I build solutions and solve problems.
footer.footer-info2: As a Front-end Developer with L1 Support experience, I divide my time between two passions: writing efficient code to create incredible interfaces and diagnosing technical issues to ensure everything runs perfectly.
footer.footer-info3: Support taught me that user empathy is the cornerstone of great development. I don't just care about aesthetics; I strive for functionality, accessibility, and bug-free performance. If it breaks, I fix it; if it‚Äôs an idea, I build it.
